snippet: With house prices still down, some large investors are creating huge portfolios by buying thousands of homes at deep discounts and then renting them out.
abstract: House prices remain down more than a third from their peak and with the market swamped with foreclosures some large investors are creating huge portfolios by buying thousands of homes at deep discounts and then renting them out; nobody has ever tried this on such a large scale, and critics worry these new investors could face big challenges managing large portfolios of dispersed rental houses.
lead_paragraph: With house prices still down, some large investors are creating huge portfolios by buying thousands of homes at deep discounts and then renting them out.

headline.seo: Investors Aim to Buy Thousands of Homes to Rent to Tenants
headline.main: Investors Are Looking to Buy Homes by the Thousands
